name: Canal Engineering
description:
CANAL | By Canal Engineering Ltd

For 15 years CANAL Architectural metalwork and fabrication has been the heart of Canal Engineering's business.
Many CANAL projects are for staircases and balustrade, but our experience extends to all aspects of architectural metalwork including;

•	Canopies
•	Balconies
•	Bespoke railings
•	Sculptures

Staircases
Staircases can be produced in straight, spiral or helical form. All are fabricated to bespoke design criteria, catering for a true one-of requirement.

Balustrade
Glass, mesh, perforated sheet, tension cables and laser cut sheet in-fills can be specified and many other materials may also be available on request.

Handrail
Many different types of handrail can be fabricated to complement the different aspects of each individual staircase. Along with various fitting methods to suit the location, Handrail can be stainless steel, mild steel, timber, polyester or nylon coated with many other materials available on request. CANAL can also provide thermoplastic polymer alloy coating conforming to UK Building Regulations.

The CANAL philosophy is based on offering the very best practical engineering advice for every required application; making sure that original design concepts presented are not compromised. We have developed an enviable reputation as market leaders in quality and design innovation, providing a strong and loyal client base in the U.K and abroad. 

From concept to completion CANAL can’t be beat, so make your vision a reality with CANAL | By Canal Engineering.
